1.8.6.name: wordpress/wp-mashsocial-wigdet
1.8.6.description:
WP MashSocial Wigdet : A beautiful widget inspired by Mashable to be used in sidebar, it allows you to add your Pinterest, G+ , Twitter , Facebook and Feeds Subscription in it .

Ver = 1.8.5 = *Mashsocial is now Responsive *Issue with Google Plus Circle resolved (Google API Updated) *Asynchronous Loading (To increase Page Speed) *Leave IDs Blank to Remove them. *Relation Publisher Updated *Google Add to circle Options Added.

1.Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it. 2.Goto your Appearance>Widgets and then modify its data as required.

That's all !!! I hope you enjoy the plugin.

More Details & Support:

  • Demo : Demo WordPress & Blogging =
  • Support Thread http://freakify.com/2012/01/wordpress-wp-mashsocial-widget-by-ahmad-awais/ .-
